_header: In Alexandria that great City / There was a man of much poustie
Subjects: Euphrosine, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Euphrosine in the Vernon Golden Legend — in short couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IN Alisaundre þat gret Citeeþer was a mon of muche
                    pouste…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Wiþ him þerin for to leendeGod graunte vs grace
                    þat hit so beAMEN AMEN for Charite
